meanings.definition: An exclamation of disgust or disapproval.
meanings.sent2: She wrinkled her nose and said, 'Pugh, this is awful.'
meanings.sent3: Pugh! I accidentally put salt instead of sugar in my coffee!
meanings.sent4: The garbage pile outside the house made everyone go 'Pugh!'
meanings.sent5: The spoiled milk made him exclaim, 'Pugh!'

meanings.sent1: The teacher called out 'Pugh' during attendance.
meanings.sent2: Mr. Pugh is our new neighbor down the street.
meanings.sent3: I met a person named Pugh at the library yesterday.
meanings.sent4: The Pugh family has been living in this town for generations.
meanings.sent5: The name 'Pugh' was engraved on the old family crest.
